mapper.select: select JS_ClientID, JS_ClientName, JS_Sex, JS_CretificateType, JS_IDNumber, JS_PhoneNumber, JS_ClientRank, JS_RegisterWay, JS_InternetOpenType, JS_Nationality, JS_DateOfBirth, JS_MaritalStatus, JS_DegreeOfEducation, JS_Profession, JS_IndustryInvolved, JS_TechnicalTitle, JS_AdministrativeRanks, JS_ToSupportThePopulation, JS_WorkUnit, JS_EnterTheWorkUnitTime from JSBanKUserInfo.JsClientInfo where JS_ClientID = #{jsClientid}

select JS_ClientID, JS_ClientName, JS_Sex, JS_CretificateType, JS_IDNumber, JS_PhoneNumber, JS_ClientRank, JS_RegisterWay, JS_InternetOpenType, JS_Nationality, JS_DateOfBirth, JS_MaritalStatus, JS_DegreeOfEducation, JS_Profession, JS_IndustryInvolved, JS_TechnicalTitle, JS_AdministrativeRanks, JS_ToSupportThePopulation, JS_WorkUnit, JS_EnterTheWorkUnitTime from JSBanKUserInfo.JsClientInfo limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into JSBanKUserInfo.JsClientInfo(JS_ClientID,JS_ClientName, JS_Sex, JS_CretificateType, JS_IDNumber, JS_PhoneNumber, JS_ClientRank, JS_RegisterWay, JS_InternetOpenType) values (#{jsClientid},#{jsClientname}, #{jsSex}, #{jsCretificatetype}, #{jsIdnumber}, #{jsPhonenumber}, #{jsClientrank}, #{jsRegisterway}, #{jsInternetopentype})
mapper.update:
update JSBanKUserInfo.JsClientInfo
JS_ClientName = #{jsClientname},
JS_Sex = #{jsSex},
JS_CretificateType = #{jsCretificatetype},
JS_IDNumber = #{jsIdnumber},
JS_PhoneNumber = #{jsPhonenumber},
JS_ClientRank = #{jsClientrank},
JS_RegisterWay = #{jsRegisterway},
JS_InternetOpenType = #{jsInternetopentype},
JS_Nationality = #{jsNationality},
JS_DateOfBirth = #{jsDateofbirth},
JS_MaritalStatus = #{jsMaritalstatus},
JS_DegreeOfEducation = #{jsDegreeofeducation},
JS_Profession = #{jsProfession},
JS_IndustryInvolved = #{jsIndustryinvolved},
JS_TechnicalTitle = #{jsTechnicaltitle},
JS_AdministrativeRanks = #{jsAdministrativeranks},
JS_ToSupportThePopulation = #{jsTosupportthepopulation},
JS_WorkUnit = #{jsWorkunit},
JS_EnterTheWorkUnitTime = #{jsEntertheworkunittime},
where JS_ClientID = #{jsClientid}
